description: Analyzer for BR-14 Manufacturing Process Flow

Supplier.description: Supplier/manufacturer issuing the manufacturing flow document (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material/raw material name that the process flow describes.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier or code, if shown on the document.

SOP.description: SOP or procedure identifier referenced by the process (e.g., 'MFG-VE-002').

EffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the SOP or process document.

FlowSteps.description: Ordered list of the numbered manufacturing steps as printed in the document. Keep original order and step text.

Notes.description: Any general notes, cautions, or process constraints (e.g., temperature limits, protect from light/oxygen).
